page.title: 05OLD COTTAGES
page.content: Around our area are many old, stone built cottages, many of them extended and modernised over the years. Each of them is very individual and set in a large private garden. Many of them have open fires and no central heating. Most of them have thick walls, small windows and small rooms. The occupants tell us they are difficult to heat and expensive to maintain and repair. However, in spite of all this, people are very proud to own them and enjoy their individuality. They are expensive to buy because people prefer living in the country but with easy access to the amenities of the town.
